Author: ella0124
Text: if you lose more than 1 pound in a day it’s probably water weight not fat or muscle and it comes right back when you up your intake :/  try taking pics or measurements for perspective, “gaining” five pounds is less scary (at least for me) if you can remind yourself that your waist/hip/etc measurements or clothes sizes are still similar  i prefer hip measurements because my waist goes up and down so much with bloating
